original_text: Judah's men also took for themselves the cities of Gaza, Ashkelon and Ekron, as well as the land around those cities.
korean_text: 유다가 또 가사 및 그 지역과 아스글론 및 그 지역과 에그론 및 그 지역을 점령하였고

sentences.original_text: Judah's men also took for themselves
the cities of Gaza, Ashkelon and Ekron
as well as the land around those cities
